input.sentences: i went to a fair with my friends the other day and i saw some really interesting things .
there was a snake in a terrarium that scared my friend [female] . we got chewed out by her for chuckling at her .
there was a couple of neat statues there that you could get a picture with and this guy took his picture with the couple from american gothic painting which was super cool .

there were so many booths that i couldnt keep up . this one had my friend [male] hooked because he recognized one of the girls from his college and talked to her for hours | while we walked around some more .
there was a guy there who had a goat named sprinkles and it was trained to bleat so we got him to bleat a lot and it made us laugh | a lot ! i had so much fun that day .
